message: Mink already seems familiar with this street. He leads the way to an intimidating, boxy building. There's no sign.
When I catch up, he immediately starts toward the building's entrance.

name: 用心棒
message: "Excuse me, sir, do you have a membership card?"
A man in a black suit stands at the door, blocking us with one arm.
A membership card? Of course not.
But Mink pulls a black card from his pocket.
The man in the suit takes Mink's card and inspects both sides.

name: 用心棒
message: "Welcome, sir. Please hold your Coil up to the screen."
He indicates the authentication screen next to the door. Mink and I show our Coils in turn.

name: 用心棒
message: "...Thank you. Your IDs have been verified. Welcome."
The man in the black suit gracefully opens the door.
I still don't know what's going on, but Mink strides through, cool as ice.
The building turns out to be a club of some sort.
There's a bar area right inside the door. Customers are standing around, drinking and talking.
There's another door farther inside. It must lead to the dance floor. I can feel the bass from here.
Why did he drag me here...

name: 蒼葉
message: "Why do you have one of those cards?"

name: ミンク
message: "I bought it from a guard. The original owner didn't need it any more."

name: 蒼葉
message: "Why not?"

name: ミンク
message: "Because he was dead."

name: 蒼葉
message: "...So you were planning to come here all along."

name: ミンク
message: "Yeah."

name: 蒼葉
message: "What, you like dancing or something?"

name: ミンク
message: "They use photonarcotics at this club."

name: 蒼葉
message: "Photonarcotics... I've heard of those."
I remember hearing a rumor of some new drug like that back in the Old Residential District.

name: ミンク
message: "They're not like regular drugs. These use light to put your mind in a semi-conscious state."

name: ミンク
message: "Supposedly, it's like having a waking dream."

name: ミンク
message: "It doesn't fuck you up like regular drugs."

name: ミンク
message: "But since the gear to make it work is expensive, not many people have access."

name: ミンク
message: "That's what's on the other side of that door. Scared?"

name: 蒼葉
message: "Me? Yeah right."

name: ミンク
message: "Good."
Mink smirks for some reason, then heads for the door.
...I don't get what his deal is, but I hate the way he treats me like a kid sometimes.
After shooting a glare at Mink's massive back, I follow him to the door.
There's another black-suited man standing next to this door. Mink whispers something into his ear.
The man nods and holds out his right hand.
It's hard to tell in the dark, but looking closer, I see another door farther along.
Mink heads for that door and I follow.
